page.title: 10Ethnic Minorities in Aston
page.content: Mr Holder,now of Aston,is a black man, resident in England for 28 yrs with 3 self-confident black children, Anne 12, Duncan 14 & Liam 16.They have been called names like chocolate drop, nigger & told to get back to Africa. Despite racial discrimination they have plenty of white friends.Father owns 2 taxis in a successful business & all the family like living in South Yorkshire.Adrian is black, very shy & quiet living in a white household & community.He thinks people are stupid who call him nigger, blacky, chocolate drop & gollywog.A local shop owner has refused to serve him & made him wait till last.A white man attempted to knock him down saying this is what I think of niggers.Racialism bothers him a great deal. S.F. V.B. C.W. G.J.
